oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Can Functional Food and Organic Food be Supporting Concepts in Europe?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bügel, Susanne
Almer, Kamille
Zalecka, A.
Ploeger, A.
Huber, Machteld
Kahl, J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Poster IUNS 20st International Congress of Nutrition. Functional and organic food belong to fast growing segments of the European food market. The question is whether organic food can also be a functional food. The conclusion is that functional food and organic food are competing rather than supporting concepts in Europe.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bügel, Susanne ; Almer, Kamille; Zalecka, A.; Ploeger, A.; Huber, Machteld and Kahl, J. (2013) Can Functional Food and Organic Food be Supporting Concepts in Europe? Poster at: IUNS 2013, Granada Spain, 15-20 September 2013. [Completed]
